mentions.tacticalSituation: If you want to beat the SNP here one seat would become theirs if not changed. Tactical voting is the only way to be sure to win Edinburgh Central.

issues.brexitEurope: It's no secret that Nicola Sturgeon is trying to carve out by this election will keep parliament in which Nationalist SNP will hold the balance of power. And it also no surprise that her price for any deal with an abortive government on tactical independence, as early as next year.
issues.governance: Politics has changed a march over the last few years and there is a thirst for a different kind of politics.

leaflet.personalStatement: There is a thirst for a different kind of politics.

images.caption: Image of a letter from Ruth Davidson MSP

leaflet.additionalNotes: The letter suggests an imperative to beat the SNP in the constituency, mentions Brexit indirectly, associates the SNP with wanting independence, and implies there is a growing discontent with the current state of politics.
